      Returns a list of all tasks at a given workstation.

      Returns a list of pending tasks at a given workstation.

    • Uses of Task in logic.car

      Methods in logic.car that return types with arguments of type Task 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Task> TaskOrderDetails.getPendingTasks()
      Returns the pending tasks for this task order's details.
      java.util.List<Task> CarOrderDetails.getPendingTasks()
      Returns a list of tasks that still need to be completed for this car order's detail.
      java.util.List<Task> TaskOrder.getTasks()
      Returns a list of tasks that are required to complete this task order.
      abstract java.util.List<Task> Order.getTasks()
      Returns a list of tasks that are required to complete this order.
      java.util.List<Task> CarOrder.getTasks()
      Returns a list of tasks which are required to complete this car order's details and thus the car itself.
